pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, October 28, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual discussion with women from business and social services sectors in Peel Region. The discussion will be moderated by Minister of Diversity and Inclusion and Youth Bardish Chagger.

Minister of Public Services and Procurement Anita Anand, Minister for Women and Gender Equality and Rural Economic Development Maryam Monsef, and several caucus members from Peel Region will be in attendance.

Closed to media.
